Tweets by InovateWithAdam

VulnGuardian

Cybersecurity bot that performs comprehensive vulnerability analysis on web applications, APIs, JavaScript, and LLMs following OWASP guidelines.

ThreatSage

Specialized ChatGPT bot designed to uncover hidden threats and potential vulnerabilities from incomplete or partial CVE data.

ExploitCraft

Red team toolkit for ethical hackers, featuring custom-built exploits and penetration testing utilities.

NetSentry

Network monitoring system with AI-powered anomaly detection to identify suspicious traffic patterns in real-time.

DeepDefender

Machine learning framework for detecting advanced persistent threats (APTs) using behavioral analysis.

CryptoAudit

Blockchain security auditing tool that analyzes smart contracts for vulnerabilities and potential exploits.
